characters: Driver of a blue truck, a man in blue clothing, a person in black clothing
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving in an urban area. A blue truck is ahead, moving slowly. At 6.5 seconds, a man in blue clothing suddenly appears from the left side, running across the road, and a person in black clothing is seen walking in the middle of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while following the blue truck. At 6.5 seconds, the vehicle needs to decelerate rapidly due to the sudden appearance of a man in blue clothing from the left side, running across the road.
key_objects: 1) Front: A blue truck, approximately 5 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Left side: A man in blue clothing, approximately 1 meter away, running across the road. 3) Front: A person in black clothing, approximately 10 meters away, walking in the middle of the road.
